page.title: 02A day in the life of Freddy.
page.content: On a school day I get up at 7o'clock. I get dressed after I have brushed my teeth and washed.Then I go downstairs for breakfast. Sometimes I have bacon and egg for breakfast .Sometimes I have 'eggy bread' which is bread dipped in egg and fried.I finish breakfast by 8 o'clock .Then I do a job - like sweeping or something. I walk to the bus stop. I travel four miles to school. I get there at 8.40. I follow a normal school day with four lessons. I stay for school meals. School finishes at 3.30pm and my bus comes at 4.00pm. I get back in the house at 4.30pm. I have tea - man be quiche or baked bean pie. Then I go out to play with a friend until 7.30pm. Then I have supper and watch television. I go to bed at 9 O'clock.
